availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucinda Reeder Harris in Campbell County, Kentucky, on May 24, 1834. Father of Sarah Harris, John Harris, James Harris, and Zachariah Harris. Farmer in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, p. 157B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 1, p. 375.
Northern Kentucky Marriages, 1795-1850, Ancestry, Campbell County, Kentucky, 1834.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Kenton County Wills, vol. 3-4, 1879-1889, p. 232.
